casebody.data:
Richard L. MARTIN and Twila J. Martin, Husband and Wife, and Marlin L. Martin and Marlene B. Martin, Husband and Wife
v.
HEIDELBERG TOWNSHIP ZONING HEARING BOARD
v.
Heidelberg Township Petition of: Richard L. Martin and Twila J. Martin, Husband and Wife, and Marlin L. Martin and Marlene B. Martin, Husband and Wife No. 408 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. December 19, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 19th day of December, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
